channel.title: I need a str bonus Code
channel.description:
Well.. i saw Goneby123's Glow command. which didnt work properly because it only glowed once. but if i can add a Strength bonus to that, it will be like a D-Axe special.. So can anyone give me a Strength bonus Code?
Goneby123's Code is Located [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,176204.0.html][size=11pt]Here[/size][/url]

item.description:
@system wrote:

lol
here wen u click it will train str and mi thread read Jariays lol here

case 2874: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You train Strength!"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(2555); addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[2]), 2); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

try adding the gfx some were lol in there

item.title: I need a str bonus Code
item.dc:creator: @LittleMaffia LittleMaffia
item.description:
@LittleMaffia wrote:

[quote=“Jairiya, post:5, topic:125924”]Ok here is a tut for it just made it up =p
[hr]
ok first go into your client.java and search for

public int untradable[] = {};

then under it add

public boolean glow = false;

then search for

/*END OF FRAME TESTING*/[/CODE]

and under it add

[CODE]        else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("glow") && playerRights >= 1)
        {
               glow = true;
        }
        else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("glowoff") && playerRights >= 1)
        {
               glow =false;
        }[/CODE]
 
Then search for 
[CODE]        public boolean process() {
WriteWildyLevel();
SpecialsProcess();	
writePlayers();

and under it the writePlayers(); add this

if (glow == true) {//Glow stillgfx(482, absY, absX); stillgfx(365, absY, absX); }

and thats all =D Made by Dan(me Jairiya)[/quote]

this one ownz

Read full topic
